name: test-yarn2
description: Tests for dictionaries included by a Yarn 2 repository

scripts.setup-yarn: pnpm run setup-yarn-med && pnpm run setup-yarn-sci && pnpm run setup-eslint-plugin
scripts.test-yarn: pnpm run test-yarn-med && pnpm run test-yarn-sci && pnpm run test-eslint-plugin
scripts.update:eslint-plugin: cd test-eslint-plugin && corepack use yarn@stable && corepack yarn update:dep
scripts.update:yarn-med: cd test-yarn-med && corepack use yarn@stable && corepack yarn update:dep
scripts.update:yarn-sci: cd test-yarn-sci && corepack use yarn@stable && corepack yarn update:dep
scripts.update-yarn: pnpm update:eslint-plugin && pnpm update:yarn-med && pnpm update:yarn-sci
